statements: SELECT * FROM user_progress WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, progress FROM user_progress WHERE completion_status = TRUE;
SELECT course_id, progress FROM user_progress WHERE course_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT completion_status FROM user_progress WHERE progress < 50;
SELECT user_id, course_id, progress FROM user_progress ORDER BY progress DESC;
SELECT user_id, progress, completion_status FROM user_progress WHERE progress > 50 ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_progress WHERE completion_status = true AND course_id = 101 ORDER BY user_id ASC, progress DESC;
SELECT user_id, course_id, MAX(progress) AS max_progress FROM user_progress GROUP BY user_id, course_id;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT user_id) AS total_users, AVG(progress) AS average_progress FROM user_progress WHERE completion_status = false;
SELECT user_id, course_id, progress, CASE WHEN progress >= 90 THEN 'Completed' ELSE 'In Progress' END AS status FROM user_progress WHERE course_id IN (101, 102) ORDER BY course_id, user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM UserProgress WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT course_id, progress_percentage FROM UserProgress ORDER BY progress_percentage DESC;
SELECT user_id, course_id, completion_status FROM UserProgress WHERE completion_status = 'Completed';
SELECT course_id, user_rating FROM CourseEngagement WHERE user_rating >= 4;
SELECT * FROM CourseEngagement ORDER BY timestamp_started ASC, timestamp_completed DESC;
SELECT user_id, course_id, completion_status, progress_percentage, last_accessed_timestamp FROM UserProgress WHERE completion_status = 'Completed';
SELECT course_id, user_rating, comments, timestamp_completed, timestamp_started FROM CourseEngagement WHERE user_rating > 3 ORDER BY timestamp_started DESC;
SELECT user_id, course_id, completion_status, progress_percentage, last_accessed_timestamp FROM UserProgress WHERE progress_percentage BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY user_id, course_id;
SELECT course_id, user_rating, comments FROM CourseEngagement WHERE timestamp_started > '2021-01-01' AND timestamp_started < '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, course_id, completion_status, progress_percentage, last_accessed_timestamp FROM UserProgress WHERE user_id = 101 AND course_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE registration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT course_name, start_date, end_date FROM courses ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, course_id, progress_percentage FROM user_progress WHERE progress_percentage > 50;
SELECT user_id, course_id, progress_percentage, last_updated FROM user_progress ORDER BY last_updated;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE username = 'John_Doe';
SELECT course_name, start_date, end_date FROM courses WHERE course_id = 3;
SELECT username, email, registration_date FROM users WHERE registration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM user_progress WHERE progress_percentage >= 75;
SELECT * FROM UserProgress WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT course_id, progress_percent FROM UserProgress WHERE progress_percent > 50;
SELECT course_title, course_duration FROM Courses WHERE course_duration < 10;
SELECT user_id, engagement_level FROM UserEngagement WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM MediaResources WHERE resource_type = 'video';
SELECT * FROM UserProgress WHERE progress_percent > 80;
SELECT course_title, course_description FROM Courses WHERE course_duration > 10;
SELECT user_id, course_id, engagement_level FROM UserEngagement WHERE engagement_level = 'High';
SELECT * FROM MediaResources WHERE resource_type = 'Video' AND course_id IN (SELECT course_id FROM Courses WHERE course_duration < 15);
SELECT user_id, SUM(progress_percent) AS total_progress FROM UserProgress GROUP BY user_id HAVING SUM(progress_percent) > 200;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT course_name, description FROM courses WHERE course_id = 3;
SELECT user_id, progress, last_updated FROM user_progress WHERE course_id = 2 ORDER BY progress DESC;
SELECT * FROM media_resources WHERE resource_type = 'video' ORDER BY created_at ASC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, course_name, description FROM courses WHERE course_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5 ORDER BY course_id DESC;

SELECT users.username, courses.course_name, user_progress.progress FROM users JOIN user_progress ON users.user_id = user_progress.user_id JOIN courses ON user_progress.course_id = courses.course_id WHERE users.username LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY user_progress.progress DESC;

SELECT u.username, c.course_name, e.engagement_rating FROM users u JOIN user_engagement e ON u.user_id = e.user_id JOIN courses c ON e.course_id = c.course_id WHERE e.engagement_rating >= 4 AND e.date_visited > '2022-02-01' ORDER BY e.engagement_rating DESC, e.date_visited ASC;
